mapper.insert: insert all into board (seq, user_id, bcode, name, email, subject, content, hit, logtime) values(#{seq}, #{userId}, #{bcode}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, sysdate) into reboard (rseq, seq, ref, lev, step, pseq, reply) values (seq_reboard_rseq.nextval, #{seq}, #{ref}, 0, 0, 0, 0) select * from dual
mapper.select: select b.seq, b.name, b.email, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.logtime, b.bcode, r.rseq, r.ref, r.lev, r.step, r.pseq, r.reply from board b, reboard r where b.seq = r.seq and b.seq = #{seq}
